nodes.text: Star Wars 104: Nagais and Dolls is the one-hundred-fourth issue in the Marvel Star Wars series of comics.

Luke, Leia, Han and their friends fly to Zeltros to enlist their aid in the war against the Nagai, only to have the war follow them! "Nagais and Dolls" is written by Jo Duffy, penciled by Cynthia Martin and inked by Art Nichols.
The title is a reference to Guys and Dolls, a real-world musical.

In the credits, the inker is listed as "Not the real Cindy, but an incredible simulation." The publisher's summary in Marvel Age 35 lists Art Nichols as the inker, possibly meaning Nichols and penciller Cynthia Martin shared inking duties.
Beginning with this issue, Star Wars is published bi-monthly, rather than monthly.
